cp1.processing.algorithms.discretization package¶

Submodules¶

cp1.processing.algorithms.discretization.accuracy_discretization module¶

accuracy_discretization.py

Provides a gurantee on the accuracy of the overall solution in relation to the optimal solution. Guaranteed accuracy is: 1 - accuracy i.e. accuracy = 0.001, therefore guaranteed accuracy is 99.999 num_discretizations = (1 - 0.001) * (100 / ta.utility_threshold)

Author: Tameem Samawi (tsamawi@cra.com)

class cp1.processing.algorithms.discretization.accuracy_discretization.AccuracyDiscretization(accuracy)[source]¶

Bases: cp1.processing.algorithms.discretization.discretization_strategy.DiscretizationStrategy

discretize(constraints_object)[source]¶

cp1.processing.algorithms.discretization.bandwidth_discretization module¶

bandwidth_discretization.py

Discretizes uniformly with respect to bandwidth. i.e. num_discretizations = 100, ta.min_bandwidth = 200 2000 - 200 = 1800 1800 / 100 = 180 [200, 380, 560, 740, 820, 1000…]

Author: Tameem Samawi (tsamawi@cra.com)

class cp1.processing.algorithms.discretization.bandwidth_discretization.BandwidthDiscretization(num_discretizations)[source]¶

cp1.processing.algorithms.discretization.value_discretization module¶

value_discretization.py

Discretizes uniformly with respect to utility_threshold. i.e. num_discretizations = 100, ta.utility_threshold = 20 ta.compute_value(2000) = 85 85 - 20 = 65 65 / 100 = 6.5 [ta.compute_bandwidth(ta.utility_threshold + 6.5), ta.compute_bandwidth(ta.utility_threshold) + 13 etc…]

Author: Tameem Samawi (tsamawi@cra.com)
